#summary How to install the Crypt class?
#labels Phase-Deploy

== Installing from the web ==

Getting the [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2 tar.bz2] package:

{{{
$ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
}}}

Getting the [http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.gz tar.gz] package:

{{{
$ wget http://cryptclass.googlecode.com/files/cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvjpf cryptclass_v2.2.tar.bz2
}}}

== Installing from the SVN ==
